value.title: Japan risks second coronavirus wave as hygiene fatigue sets in
value.excerpt: With the appearance of coronavirus in February, they have raised the frequency and used a stronger antiseptic solution. value.title: Foreigners net sellers of Japanese stocks last week on coronavirus nerves
